meanings.definition: To express in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She rephrased the sentence to make it easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: He always rephrased his ideas to clarify them.
meanings.sent3: The teacher rephrased the question, causing the students to giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her rephrased version of the story added a new perspective.
meanings.sent5: The rephrased instructions made the task seem simpler.
